document.full_text: the recent high-profile hacking of google's gmail service and sony's playstation gaming network is threatening to slow the take-off of the next big thing in the computing space - the cloud.
document.title: hacker attacks threaten to dampen cloud computing's prospects
lines_and_colors: the recent high-profile hacking of google's gmail service and sony's playstation gaming network is threatening to slow the take-off of the next big thing in the computing space - the cloud.
